a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Perceived importance of science in treating anxiety or depression vs.
Share who say science helps a lot in treating anxiety or depression. Respondents were asked: 'In general, how much do you
think science helps us treat the following health problems? Does it help a lot, some, not much, or not at all?'
Data source: Wellcome Global Monitor (2021); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
